Text:
...I think it was me...

Thank you very much! As I rediscoverd Poco some time ago I remembered some very nice Furay records; that brings back lots of memoies!

Excellent Post, however I noticed some cuts of "I still have Dreams" skip a bit. Was this ripped from a cd? I appreciate what you've done, but if there was a way to get them re upped clean.
I'd be happy, happy. Huge Richie/Poco fan.
